0.Summary: "717 East Broadway, Horrible place to work. Americas Worst First Job"
0.Pros: Flexible schedule, easy tasks, half off food for crew and free for management
0.Cons: Rude management team, disrespectful crew, very low pay, uneducated employees, discrimination, picking favorites, unfair discipline, EXTREMELY UNPROFESSIONAL

1.Pros: A few nice people. Easy to learn.
1.Cons: Miscommunication between managers and employees. Too much rude behavior by other crew members.

2.Pros: I guess the only pro was to learn basic customer service
2.Cons: Very little pay, hard to become management

3.Cons: Rotating management, availability only at night shift
